z_score_function <- function(x,y){
  Mu_ngp_8 <- mean(x)
sigma_ngp_8 <-sd(x)
TBA_ngp_8<- mean(y)
SE_TBD_ngp_8<- sigma_ngp_8/sqrt(length(y)) 
MIA_ngp_8<- (TBA_ngp_8 - Mu_ngp_8)/SE_TBD_ngp_8
MIA_ngp_8
  
}
